name: IETC
short_description:
With the emerging trend of using technical and modern equipment’s, various business targets for the growth of their company and products in an advanced way.

IETC a well-known roofing company based in India offers its different services with utmost technical support to meet client’s need in every possible way. With entire commitment to their trusted clients provides best quality Roofing Sheets, Roof Ventilation Systems enhanced with Pre- Engineered Building System and for construction purpose the company also engages serving Self-Drilling Screws.
The company diversifies in providing best designed roofing sheets as Color Coated Roofing Sheets, Metal Roofing Sheets, and Pre Galvanized Roofing sheets to ensure the comfortable and strong roof. It fulfills the purposes in various office or industrial buildings.
